properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape Charles Light VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 23 at 10:37PM EST until January 25 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...East then southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to
25 kt late Friday into Saturday morning, then south around 15
kt becoming southwest late Saturday morning through Saturday
afternoon. Seas 5 to 8 ft expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape Charles
Light VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 4 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY
